title: Pornhub’s new owner says it will defend sex workers and share the platform's tools
description: Mindgeek, owner of Pornhub, was acquired Thursday by private equity firm Ethical Capital Partners. The company's Vice President shared its plans for the site.

title: After hearing of Biden’s potential TikTok ban, some users say they’re not worried (yet)
description: Their favorite app might get banned — but instead of panicking, some TikTok users said they remain unfazed.

title: Capitol Police were not told Republicans would turn Jan. 6 footage over to Tucker Carlson
description: Capitol Police were not told that footage of the Jan. 6 attack on the Capitol, which they gave to Republicans, would be passed on to Tucker Carlson.

title: Jan. 6 rioter who was accused of urging the mob to steal police guns scheduled to be sentenced
description: Samuel Lazar, a Donald Trump supporter and Jan. 6 rioter was scheduled to be sentenced on Friday, according to a source familiar with the proceedings.

title: 'The Wire' star Lance Reddick dies from natural causes, publicist says
description: "The Wire" star Lance Reddick, 60, died Friday, his publicist said.

title: What a TikTok ban would mean for users
description: The Biden administration indicated it could ban TikTok nationwide if Chinese company ByteDance doesn’t sell the app. Here’s how the move could impact users.

title: OpenAI’s newest tech has drastically changed the direction of these 5 companies
description: Five organizations that were the first to access GPT-4, the latest product from OpenAI — best known for ChatGPT — said the tech has shifted their direction.

title: The DOJ and FBI are investigating TikTok over allegations its employees spied on journalists
description: The Department of Justice and FBI are investigating TikTok over allegations that company employees spied on journalists, a law enforcement official said.

title: Republicans prepare for battle in the race to unseat Ohio Sen. Sherrod Brown
description: The race to take on Sen. Sherrod Brown, D-Ohio, could soon be crowded, with at least three prominent Republicans weighing whether to enter the primary field.

title: How the government protects bank accounts, in three charts
description: How the FDIC is able to guarantee money for Silicon Valley Bank and Signature Bank account holders, and how it limits bank failure contagion effects.

title: Law enforcement agencies prepare for a possible Trump indictment as early as next week
description: Local, state, and federal law enforcement and security agencies are preparing for the possibility that former president Donald Trump could be indicted as early as next week, according to five senior officials.

title: Biden urges Congress to make it easier to punish bank executives after collapse
description: President Joe Biden on Friday called on Congress to pass legislation that would make it easier for the government to publish bank executives.

title: International Criminal Court issues arrest warrant for Putin over alleged Ukraine war crimes
description: The International Criminal Court issued an arrest warrant Friday for Russian President Vladimir Putin, accusing him of being responsible for war crimes committed in Ukraine.

title: YouTube lifts restrictions on Trump’s account
description: Google-owned YouTube will allow former President Donald Trump’s account to post new videos as of Friday, lifting restrictions put in place following the Jan. 6 insurrection at the U.S.

title: Female soldier found dead at same Texas Army base where Vanessa Guillén was murdered
description: A female soldier died earlier this week at Fort Hood, the same Army base in Texas where Vanessa Guillén was murdered three years ago, officials said.

title: Parent of Silicon Valley Bank seeks bankruptcy protection
description: The parent of Silicon Valley Bank, seized last week by the U.S., is filing for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection.

title: Hunter Biden's lawyers mount legal offensive against Trump allies over laptop data
description: Hunter Biden's lawyers mounted a legal offensive against Trump allies, countersuing on the alleged dissemination of Biden's laptop data and seeking Bannon, Giuliani depositions.

title: New Zealand lawmakers banned from TikTok amid data use fears
description: New Zealand lawmakers and other workers inside the nation’s Parliament will be banned from having the TikTok app on their government phones, officials said Friday.

title: Pence doubles down on 'maternity leave' remarks about Pete Buttigieg: 'He can't take a joke'
description: Former Vice President Pence shrugged off criticism and defended what the White House called a "homophobic" joke he told about Pete Buttigieg's parental leave and about postpartum depression.

title: Nuclear power plant leaks 400,000 gallons of radioactive water
description: Minnesota regulators said Thursday they’re monitoring the cleanup of a leak of 400,000 gallons of radioactive water from Xcel Energy’s Monticello nuclear power plant, and the company said there’s no danger to the public.

title: Once a darling of defense hawks, Ron DeSantis retreats
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis has moved away from his hawkish foreign policy views he held in Congress, now that he's a likely presidential candidate.

title: Border crossings from Canada into New York, Vermont and N.H. are up tenfold. Local cops want help.
description: Illegal border crossings from Canada into New York in the past 5 months are up tenfold and crossers are in danger of freezing to death. Local cops want help.

title: Drug war allies U.S. and Mexico aren't getting along. What happened?
description: Current and ex-U.S. officials say the relationship between War allies Mexico and the U.S. has deteriorated badly just as the deadly threat of fentanyl grows.

title: BNSF train derailment spills diesel fuel on tribal land in Washington state
description: Two BNSF trains derailed in separate incidents in Arizona and Washington state on Thursday, with the latter spilling diesel fuel on tribal land along Puget Sound.

title: Teens Under Pressure: Mental Health & Social Media
description: We are facing a serious mental health crisis with teens under pressure like never before. In this NBC News Now Special we provide insight beyond the statistics by examining the causes of this crisis, what role social media is playing and what can be done to help young people. In “Teens Under Pressure: Mental Health & Social Media”, Savannah Sellers talks to a group of teens from Fairfax County, Virginia and speaks with the Education Secretary and Surgeon General who says, “youth mental hea

title: Jewish newspaper's former editor charged in connection with Jan. 6 riot
description: The former top editor of a Brooklyn-based Jewish newspaper was arrested Thursday on a charges tied to the Jan. 6 attack on the Capitol.
